Package lazykits.statistics

Class InferData

java.lang.Object
lazykits.statistics.InferData
All Implemented Interfaces:
Statistic
public class InferData extends Object implements Statistic
Class for calculating inferential statistics.

    • sampVari

      public double sampVari()
      Calculates the variance of an array of doubles using the sample formula (divided by n-1). This method provides an unbiased estimator of the population variance when the data is a sample.
      Specified by:
      sampVari in interface Statistic
      Returns:
      The sample variance.

    • sampDev

      public double sampDev()
      Calculates the standard deviation of an array of doubles using the sample formula (divided by n-1). This method provides an unbiased estimator of the population standard deviation when the data is a sample.
      Specified by:
      sampDev in interface Statistic
      Returns:
      The sample standard deviation.

    • Ttable

      public float Ttable(float confidenceLevel, int n)
      Retrieves the t-value from the t-table based on the given confidence level and sample size.
      Parameters:
      confidenceLevel - The desired confidence level.
      n - The sample size.
      Returns:
      The corresponding t-value.
